data: TM AMB Hepatitis B Immune Globulin (HbIG Liver Transplant) Once (Day of Treatment)
Indications for HbIG:  - Recipient has prior Hepatitis B  - Recipient has active Hepatitis B  - Recipient has a history of Hepatitis Delta (HDV)  - Donor has active Hepatitis B
Administer - Hepatitis B Immune Globulin IM/Subcutaneous
Routine, Administer: 10 mL, subcutaneous, once, May be administered as 4 X 2.5 mL SC injections; total dose 10 mL, T;N

If the patient exhibits signs or symptoms of a Transfusion Reaction, Print Transfusion Reaction Form from FormFast and follow your transfusion reaction guideline.  Notify provider of the transfusion reaction to obtain further care instructions
Schedule Transfusion - Hepatitis B Immune Globulin
VGH SOT Liver Post, HbIG Injection, Next Available Appointment
